comments:
Was running 20011114 build.  Moved over to 20011204 build.  

1. Opened my old workspace and got an error in my dos window (something about 
instantiating an action).  
2. Closed All my perspectives, exited and re-entered.  I no longer got the error 
in the dos window.
3. In my workspace, my Run menu was populated.  I attempted to run something and 
I was told it was out-of-date and would be removed (this is okay), but then I 
get the following internal error:
